org.wildfly.security.password.spec

Interface PasswordSpec

  • All Superinterfaces:
    KeySpec
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClearPasswordSpec, DigestPasswordSpec, EncryptablePasswordSpec, HashPasswordSpec, IteratedHashPasswordSpec, IteratedSaltedHashPasswordSpec, MaskedPasswordSpec, OneTimePasswordSpec, SaltedHashPasswordSpec

    public interface PasswordSpec
extends KeySpec
    A password specification object.
